name: Android-gradient-buttons
body:
Some 3D buttons for Android

Simple code easy to implement

Steps to configure

 * Create the xml files in drawable folders for specific colors (I created Black Purple and Red).
 *  Define the stylesheet tag for general button properties.
 *  Define the button tag and assign the stylesheet.


and thats it you are done.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
